title: Instructional Practice Competency Enhancement: Applying a Learner-Centered OER Development Model (GHOSHEH)

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with basic OER (Open Educational Resources) authoring tools and elementary social studies curriculum comprehension
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can plan elementary social studies OERs following the 4-stage GHOSHEH Model (Analysis-Activity Design-Evaluation-Sharing).
Learners can apply ≥3 sequential activity design strategies to promote reflection and collaboration.
Learners can execute OER quality improvement processes using formative assessment and feedback systems.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
